com.codemelon.graph.vertex

Class UndirectedPrimVertex<E extends SpanningTreeEdgeData>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.AbstractVertex
      • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.DirectedEdgeDataVertex<T>
        • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.UndirectedEdgeDataVertex<E>
          • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.UndirectedKruskalVertex<E>
            • com.codemelon.graph.vertex.UndirectedPrimVertex<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChildVertex, ColoredVertex, EdgeColorVertex<E>, EdgeDataVertex<E>, EdgeWeightVertex<E>, KruskalVertex<E>, PrimVertex<E>, Vertex, WeightedVertex

    public class UndirectedPrimVertex<E extends SpanningTreeEdgeData>
extends UndirectedKruskalVertex<E>
implements PrimVertex<E>
    Undirected vertex supporting the functions necessary for Prim's algorithm. This vertex meets not only the requirements for Kruskal's algorithm (edge color and edge weight) but, in addition, also maintains a vertex weight.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.codemelon.graph.vertex.WeightedVertex

        DEFAULT_WEIGHT

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UndirectedPrimVertex(EdgeDataFactory<E> edgeDataFactory)
      Construct vertex from a factory for building appropriate EdgeData objects, initialize vertex weight and color to the default values and set vertex parent to null.
